column4: Okay, someone has to help me, this is horrible. I'm stuck on windows
whenever I reboot and choose linux at my LILO options it just says Loading Linux........ and hangs there
I can't think of anything to fix it
I waited half an hour last night to see if I could get it to load :(
you have a bunch of applications opening up when Gnome starts ?
the mouse not working at login is the biggest thing though
All i see is cron jobs and sudo commands
look for the sudo entries those others are jsut sustem level jobs being run via cron. You are using sudo and not su right ?
I found it. Does it log logins from gdm
No, I mean when I login via the gnome login screen, not terminal
gdm is the Gnome login screen those entries tell you when someone has logged in at the gnome login screen
yeah here as an example >> May 17 17:29:59 localhost gdm[7112] : (pam_unix) session opened for user willy by (uid=0) << that is from when I logged in 50 minutes ago
